mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hardcastle, S. Winifred to Herman J. Doepner regarding Herschel papers; 10 of 11
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 1-40--Scrapbook 1Hardcastle, S. Winifred to Herman J. Doepner regarding the papers of the late William Herschel. Enclosed: biographical sketch Hardcastle wrote of Herschel, her uncle, dated 10/24/1923, and a review of his book on fingerprints dated 12/07/1916.; 11 pages; DF 1212
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
Herschel, William, Sir, 17381822
